reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It clamps firmly to the 1/2" dashboard bar on my KLR650. Holds my Garmin securely even when I'm bouncing down rotted gravel roads. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, affordable mount. Responsive seller and even better Amazon.
reviews.reviewText: Fits 2019 Ducati Multistrada 1260s perfectly, was mounted in the middle, at the handle bar where the Ducati logo is. That part is not round but the clamp was holding pretty good. I added a piece of rubber so the clamp grabs even better.The ball and garmin drivesmart 65 holder that comes with this mount was holding the gps better than the original garmin mount. It was a slightly tighter fit which is great. I also have some smaller tank bag which was pushing the gps/twisting it a bit but that was only when I was manuevring the bike (bike off) and parking it. During the ride everything was perfect. Combined with a separate usb cable I had a really nice setup.If someone wants even stronger connection there's always an option of glueing the ball.Suggestion for the seller/manufacturer:Add some kind of screw that can secure the ball part even better and make it easy to unscrew when needed. Other than that, love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great price, solid clamping
reviews.reviewText: Clamped well to my 1-1/4 harley bars. Great price. Though found no issue yet, but the bracket that snaps to the back of the Garmin GPS isn’t as positive latching like the name brand Garmin bracket. Overall pleased with quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I only had it mounted for a couple of rides before I realized that I don't like my GPS being mounted that low. But while I was using it, very secure and easy to install. Small enough to bring along as a back up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly robust and secure. Very satisfied.
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly robust. The wingbolt clamp adjustment is perfect for securing the unit as well as easy removal when parking and bringing your device with you. The Garmin mount that came with the clamp actually fit tighter in my gps than the garmin Mount. I would still recommend using a tether just incase it came loose. I’m very satisfied so far with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fit was perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although most items do not fit my 25mm handlebars, this, as advertised, fits perfectly. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn't mount to my Garmin
reviews.reviewText: Although it is an identical mount to my factory one, it must have been manufactured incorrectly as it keeps popping off of my Garmin. Works fine with factory mount attached to provided handlebar bracket.
